description: Fired when the command parser fails to understand a submitted command string.

payloadSchema.title: Core: Command Parse Failed Event Payload
payloadSchema.description: Defines the payload structure for the 'core:command_parse_failed' event.

actorId.description: The ID of the entity whose command failed parsing.

commandString.description: The raw command string that was submitted.

error.description: A user-friendly message describing the parsing error (e.g., 'Unknown command', 'Missing target', 'Invalid syntax').
